DOC.brief_title: Left Atrial Appendage ( LAA ) Occluders After Catheter Ablation Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Patient paroxysmal , persistent permanent nonvalvular atrial fibrillation ( AF ) Eligible long term warfarin CHADS score > = 1 ( congestive heart failure [ CHF ] , history high blood pressure , 75 year age old , diabetes , prior stroke transient ischemic attack [ TIA ] ) Contraindicated warfarin Contraindicated aspirin clopidogrel ( Plavix ) CHF Class 4 Implanted mechanical valve Atrial septal Patent Foramen Ovale ( PFO ) device Platelets < 100,000 hemoglobin < 10 Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 30 %
